topics.title: UI Localization Improvements
topics.summary: Recent updates to the French UI strings enhance the user experience by ensuring accurate translations. The changes address typographic rules and include missing strings, contributing to a more polished interface for French-speaking users.

topics.title: Package Description Handling
topics.summary: A new fix addresses the issue of empty package descriptions in the display table. Instead of showing empty boxes, dashes will be displayed when descriptions contain only HTML tags, improving the clarity of search results.

topics.title: Vulnerability Awareness in Packages
topics.summary: A user highlights the importance of being informed about vulnerabilities and deprecated packages when reviewing a package. This awareness aids in understanding potential impacts and encourages proactive investigation.
